label: 六趣
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: The heavens of desire, the human world, the world of fighting spirits (asuras), the animals world, the world of hungry-ghosts, the hells (p. 58).　[六道]
